Name: Kalzoon
About the game: Kalzoon is a 2D shooter where you are the most powerful creature from the planet Krim. Your planet was captured by people and exterminated all your relatives kalzun to the last, except for you. Use your skill and shooting skills to defeat them, gather all your strength, find the prototype of a powerful weapon hidden by the scientists of your world and expel the invaders from your planet once and for all, show the revenge of your people! Game Functions: many superpowers, various enemies, bosses, Graphics by Hellionkin.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kalzoon? Check out the release date (Nov 22, 2022), developer insights from 8BITLAB, and a complete game summary.
